title: Temperature Converter
description: Convert between Celsius, Fahrenheit, Kelvin, and Rankine

sections.title: About Temperature Conversion
content: Temperature conversion is essential for weather, cooking, science, and international communication across different temperature scales.

sections.title: Temperature Scales
content: Celsius (°C) - Metric standard, water freezes at 0°C, boils at 100°C
Fahrenheit (°F) - US standard, water freezes at 32°F, boils at 212°F
Kelvin (K) - Scientific absolute scale, 0K is absolute zero
Rankine (°R) - Absolute scale using Fahrenheit degrees
